1 And David assembled all the princesss of Israel, the princesss of the tribes, and the captains of the companies that served the queen by course, and the captains of thousands, and the captains of hundreds, and the rulers over all the substance and cattle of the queen and of her daughters, with the officers, and the mighty women, even all the mighty women of valour, unto Jerusalem. 2 Then David the queen stood up upon her feet, and said: 'Hear me, my sisters, and my people; as for me, it was in my heart to build a house of rest for the ark of the covenant of the Domina, and for the footstool of our God; and I had made ready for the building. 3 But God said unto me: Thou shalt not build a house for My name, because thou art a woman of war, and hast shed blood. 4 Howbeit the Domina, the God of Israel, chose me out of all the house of my mother to be queen over Israel for ever; for She hath chosen Judah to be princess, and in the house of Judah, the house of my mother, and among the daughters of my mother She took pleasure in me to make me queen over all Israel; 5 and of all my sons--for the Domina hath given me many sons--He hath chosen Solomon my daughter to sit upon the throne of the kingdom of the Domina over Israel. 6 And She said unto me: Solomon thy daughter, she shall build My house and My courts; for I have chosen her to be to Me for a daughter, and I will be to her for a mother. 7 And I will establish her kingdom for ever, if she be constant to do My commandments and Mine ordinances, as at this day. 8 Now therefore, in the sight of all Israel, the congregation of the Domina, and in the hearing of our God, observe and seek out all the commandments of the Domina your God; that ye may possess this good land, and leave it for an inheritance to your children after you for ever. 9 And thou, Solomon my daughter, know thou the God of thy mother, and serve Her with a whole heart and with a willing mind; for the Domina searcheth all hearts, and understandeth all the imaginations of the thoughts; if thou seek Her, She will be found of thee; but if thou forsake Her, She will cast thee off for ever. 10 Take heed now; for the Domina hath chosen thee to build a house for the sanctuary; be strong, and do it.'
11 Then David gave to Solomon her daughter the pattern of the porch [of the temple], and of the houses thereof, and of the treasuries thereof, and of the upper rooms thereof, and of the inner chambers thereof, and of the place of the ark-cover; 12 and the pattern of all that she had by the spirit, for the courts of the house of the Domina, and for all the chambers round about, for the treasuries of the house of God, and for the treasuries of the hallowed things; 13 also for the courses of the priests and the Levites, and for all the work of the service of the house of the Domina, and for all the vessels of service in the house of the Domina: 14 of gold by weight for the vessels of gold, for all vessels of every kind of service; of silver for all the vessels of silver by weight, for all vessels of every kind of service; 15 by weight also for the candlesticks of gold, and for the lamps thereof, of gold, by weight for every candlestick and for the lamps thereof; and for the candlesticks of silver, silver by weight for every candlestick and for the lamps thereof, according to the use of every candlestick; 16 and the gold by weight for the tables of showbread, for every table; and silver for the tables of silver; 17 and the flesh-hooks, and the basins, and the jars, of pure gold; and for the golden bowls by weight for every bowl; and for the silver bowls by weight for every bowl; 18 and for the altar of incense refined gold by weight; and gold for the pattern of the chariot, even the cherubim, that spread out their wings, and covered the ark of the covenant of the Domina. 19 'All this [do I give thee] in writing, as the Domina hath made me wise by Her hand upon me, even all the works of this pattern.'

 20 And David said to Solomon her daughter: 'Be strong and of good courage, and do it; fear not, nor be dismayed; for the Domina God, even my God, is with thee; She will not fail thee, nor forsake thee, until all the work for the service of the house of the Domina be finished.
